blockhashPrng().details: TODO: THIS IS PREDICTABLE (but not as easily as block number)! KEEP THINKING ABOUT THIS I think predictable is fine for most of this game's random. I want players able to plan ahead some.

cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any.

color(uint256).details: colors should NOT change with the version changing!

completeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`.

endSponsership(address,uint256).details: todo? have an approval system for this?

numberPrng(uint256).details: TODO: THIS IS PREDICTABLE! KEEP THINKING ABOUT THIS I think predictable is fine for most of this game's random. I want players able to plan ahead some.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address).details: Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`.

randomRoll((uint256)).details: TODO: think a lot more about this

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

requestOwnershipHandover().details: Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default.

sweepPrizeFund().details: TODO: limit how often this can happen?if the devFund wants a cut, that logic can be part of the prizeFund

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.

color(uint256).notice: TODO: do we want to somehow blind this until after the dice is buyDiceed? that would require more state this is here so that the game logic can upgrade but colors won't change

currentBag((uint256),uint256).notice: a random bag currently available for purchase. this changes every block

mintDevFee().notice: extra cost to mint a die. goes to the dev fund

mintPrizeFee().notice: extra cost to mint a die. goes directly to the prize pool

priceWithFees().notice: there might be some rounding errors on this as tokens move through the vault

prizeToken().notice: this is looked up during construction. it is the vault token's asset User's can withdraw this token by burning their dice

randomRoll((uint256)).notice: returns the faceId of a given die being rolled

refundPrice().notice: due to rounding of shares and the underlying token, this is an estimate. it should be close

returnDice(address,uint256[],uint256[]).notice: the player (or an operator) can burn their dice to recover half the cost

sponsor(address,uint256).notice: deposit tokens without minting any dice. all interest goes to the prize pool and dev fund.

totalSponsorships().notice: the amount of the prize token that can be withdrawn by sponsors (and the dev) any interest earned on this token while

vaultToken().notice: the source of prizes for this game
